main event: A retired Army Major and his wife observed two bright lights in the sky over McKeesport, Pennsylvania on July 5, 1965.
interesting points: The lights were about the size and brightness of first magnitude stars.,The objects hovered for about 1 minute before moving in straight lines.,Witnesses described the lights as noiseless and without discernible shape or features.,The sighting lasted around 10 minutes in total.,The report concludes with a suggestion to check satellite schedules for possible explanations.
witness description: a retired Army Major and his wife
